TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An immune cell such as a T or B lymphocyte that responds to a single, specific antigen.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "specific immune cell"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "c?lula inmunitaria espec?fica"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Célula inmunitaria que, como el linfocito T o B, responde a un solo antígeno específico.
